Title: Good Night, and Good Luck.
Production_Co: Warner Independent Pictures (WIP), 2929 Productions, Participant Media
Cast: Jeff Daniels, David Strathairn, Alex Borstein, Rose Abdoo, Dianne Reeves, Peter Martin, Christoph Luty, Jeff Hamilton, Matt Catingub, Tate Donovan, Reed Diamond, Matt Ross, Patricia Clarkson, Robert Downey Jr., George Clooney
Plot: Broadcast journalist Edward R. Murrow looks to bring down Senator Joseph McCarthy. In the early 1950's, the threat of Communism created an air of paranoia in the United States and exploiting those fears was Senator Joseph McCarthy of Wisconsin. However, CBS reporter Edward R. Murrow and his producer Fred W. Friendly decided to take a stand and challenge McCarthy and expose him for the fear monger he was. However, their actions took a great personal toll on both men, but they stood by their convictions and helped to bring down one of the most controversial senators in American history. Written by Brian Washington <Sargebri@att.net>
Awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 37 wins & 112 nominations.
Location: CBS Television City - 7800 Beverly Blvd., Fairfax, Los Angeles, California, USA
Actors: David Strathairn, George Clooney, Patricia Clarkson
Description: Directed by George Clooney.  With David Strathairn, George Clooney, Patricia Clarkson, Jeff Daniels. Broadcast journalist Edward R. Murrow looks to bring down Senator Joseph McCarthy.
